overview.heroDesc: A comprehensive design system built on the Five-High / Five-Standard / Five-Implementation methodology. OKLCH color space, CSS Custom Properties, and full WCAG AA accessibility.
overview.futureDesc: Cool blues & cyans with soft glow effects. Clean, minimal, forward-looking.
overview.cyberDesc: Neon pinks & purples on dark backgrounds. Glitch effects, high contrast.
overview.businessDesc: Stable blues & neutral grays. Professional, accessible, enterprise-ready.
overview.highConsistencyDesc: Unified token naming, semantic design language
overview.colorSystemDesc: OKLCH + HEX fallback, Light/Dark dual themes
overview.scaleSystemDesc: 8px base grid: spacing, radius, border, shadow
overview.identitySystemDesc: SVG icons, logos, illustrations with icon-* tokens
overview.heroTagline: Five-High · Five-Standard · Five-Implementation — A methodology-driven comprehensive design system
overview.heroTaglineEn: Five-High · Five-Standard · Five-Implementation — A methodology-driven comprehensive design system
overview.featureComponentsDesc: 26+ polymorphic components with full ARIA support
overview.featureTokenMgrDesc: Import, edit, and export design tokens
overview.newsBlurb1: Three themes, bilingual system, full token system, 26+ components and complete QA pipeline.
overview.newsBlurb2: Updated neon parameters, enhanced glitch effects, improved dark mode contrast.
overview.newsBlurb3: Now supports SCSS, iOS (Swift), and Android (Kotlin) automated token builds.

storybook.title: Storybook Settings
storybook.subtitle: Configure component isolation testing and snapshot parameters
storybook.isolationModeDesc: When enabled, components render in isolated iframes
storybook.renderQualityDesc: Lower quality = faster animation, higher quality = more detailed rendering
storybook.isolationDescription: When Isolation Mode is enabled, all components render in independent iframes within Storybook, avoiding global CSS interference. This helps detect style leakage between components.

alignment.title: YYC³ Design Alignment Summary
alignment.subtitle: This document provides a comprehensive review of the project's current alignment with the Guidelines. Phase 1 core architecture complete; Phase 2 three major feature pages implemented; Phase 3 i18n migration and quality assurance complete; Phase 4 Prompt.md execution alignment in progress.
alignment.phase1Desc: Three themes + bilingual + 26 components + 4 pages + full token system
alignment.threeThemesDetail: Fully defined in theme.css with data-theme attribute switching
alignment.lightDarkDetail: Each theme has complete light/dark variable sets
alignment.oklchFallbackDetail: All colors defined as HEX with OKLCH values in comments
alignment.cssDrivenDetail: var(--color-*) unified reference, mapped to Tailwind via @theme inline
alignment.langContextDetail: Supports t('key') and t(zh, en) dual modes, localStorage persistence
alignment.allBilingual: All pages and components fully bilingual
alignment.allBilingualDetail: All core pages migrated to t('key') format
alignment.shadcnDetail: Button, Input, Card, Badge, Avatar, Tabs, Modal, Tooltip, Switch, Slider, Progress, Alert, Table, Select, Dialog, Checkbox, Radio, Separator, Skeleton, ScrollArea, Accordion, Breadcrumb, etc.
alignment.langToggleDetail: Displays current language, click to toggle
alignment.layoutDetail: Responsive design with mobile hamburger menu
alignment.componentsPageDetail: Left sidebar nav + component demos + search filter
alignment.playgroundPageDetail: Live edit color/spacing/radius/shadow/animation tokens with AI color recommendation
alignment.tokensPageDetail: Supports JSON / CSS / JS / TypeScript format export
alignment.routerArchDetail: Uses react-router package (not react-router-dom), RootProviders inside router tree
alignment.colorTokensDetail: Mapped to Tailwind utilities in @theme inline
alignment.shadowTokensDetail: Includes Neon Glow effect (Cyber theme exclusive)
alignment.highA11yDetail: Focus styles use outline-ring/50, interactive controls have aria-label
alignment.highCustomDetail: Playground page supports live editing all tokens
alignment.highPerf: High Performance: CSS variables direct rendering
alignment.highPerfDetail: No JS runtime color computation, CSS variable switch without repaint
alignment.highExtendDetail: shadcn/ui components support className/style override, but cross-framework not yet

alignment.jsonEditorDetail: Line numbers + syntax highlighting, using color-muted-foreground / color-primary

routeGuide.title: Route API & Extension Guide
routeGuide.subtitle: Complete routing architecture, Context API reference, keyboard shortcuts, and guidance for extending pages/themes/components
routeGuide.routeMapDesc: All registered routes with their corresponding components, descriptions, and shortcuts
routeGuide.routeOverview: System overview, Five-High/Standard/Implementation showcase, palette preview, news carousel
routeGuide.routeComponents: 26+ polymorphic component demos, category filter, JSX copy
routeGuide.routePlayground: Live-edit design tokens, AI color recommendation, CSS export
routeGuide.routeQA: Locale validation, token verification, build readiness checks
routeGuide.routeSettings: Theme presets, token editor, GitHub/font management
routeGuide.routeAlignment: Project spec alignment audit, four-phase progress tracking
routeGuide.routeApiGuide: Route API documentation and extension guidance (current page)
routeGuide.routeArchDesc: YYC³ uses react-router (not react-router-dom) Data mode. RootProviders wraps inside the route tree, rendering child routes via <Outlet />.
routeGuide.contextApiDesc: Global state management via React Context, all Providers inside the route tree
routeGuide.themeContextDesc: Theme style and light/dark mode management, supporting three visual themes × Light/Dark/System modes
routeGuide.langContextDesc: Bilingual zh/en management, supports t('key') and t(zh, en) dual-mode calls, localStorage persistence
routeGuide.langApiT: Translation function, supports t('nav.home') or t('首页', 'Home')
routeGuide.keyboardShortcutsDesc: All global shortcuts are registered in their corresponding Context or Layout components
routeGuide.extensionGuideDesc: How to add new pages, themes, or components to the existing architecture
routeGuide.addNewPageSteps:
1. Create page component in src/app/pages/ (e.g. MyPage.tsx)
2. Import and add route config in src/app/routes.tsx
3. Add nav item to navItems array in src/app/components/Layout.tsx
4. Add corresponding bilingual keys in zh.json and en.json
5. (Optional) Register keyboard shortcut in Layout.tsx
routeGuide.addNewThemeSteps:
1. Add new [data-theme='xxx'] variable set in src/styles/theme.css
2. Add new value to ThemeStyle type in ThemeContext.tsx
3. Update cycleStyle method's theme array
4. Add name in theme namespace of zh.json and en.json
5. Ensure Light/Dark dual-mode variables are complete
routeGuide.addNewComponentSteps:
1. Create component file in src/app/components/ui/
2. Use function declaration style only (no mixing const + forwardRef)
3. All colors via var(--color-*), no hardcoded values
4. Add focus style: outline: 2px solid var(--color-ring)
5. Add Token Reference comment header
6. Add showcase in ComponentsPage.tsx
routeGuide.localeKeyFormatDesc: All text must use t('namespace.key') format, no hardcoded strings
routeGuide.localeKeyFormatRules:
• Namespaces correspond to feature modules (e.g. nav / theme / components)
• Chinese quotes must use Unicode escapes (\u201C / \u201D)
• zh.json and en.json must stay in sync
• Supports nested structure, e.g. themeCustomizer.pages.home
routeGuide.tokenRefStandardDesc: Every component file must include a structured Token Reference comment at the top
routeGuide.cssVarUsageDesc: All styles must reference CSS Custom Properties, no hardcoded values
routeGuide.cssVarRules:
• Colors: var(--primary), var(--background), var(--foreground)
• Spacing: var(--spacing-1) ~ var(--spacing-8)
• Radius: var(--radius-sm) ~ var(--radius-xl)
• Shadow: var(--shadow-sm), var(--shadow-md), var(--shadow-glow)
• Animation: var(--duration-fast), var(--easing-out)
routeGuide.fiveHighChecklistDesc: Quality checks required when adding new pages/components
routeGuide.checkA11y: Accessibility: contrast >= 4.5:1, all interactive controls have aria-label, focus styles complete
routeGuide.checkCustom: Customizability: supports className and style override, colors via CSS variables
routeGuide.checkPerf: Performance: no JS runtime color computation, animation duration <= 300ms
routeGuide.checkConsist: Consistency: unified naming convention, semantic Token references
